Oh no baddie. Whatever you do, don't walk backwards whilst not watching where you're going. That's always a sure way to tread on one of the aforementioned animal traps that were not so subtly mentioned in an earlier scene. Look out. IT'S RIGHT THERE. Snap-O. Too late! 

Look out other baddie. Whatever you do don't ignore the man running up almost directly in front of you with a big stick while all you have is an automatic rifle. That's a sure way to get hit on the head! Look, he's right next to you. SHOOOOOT! Whack-O. Too late!!!

Let's hope they don't have a sudden scene change that serves to contrast the violence of man with the peace of G*d's kingdom. Surely there won't be an expected close-up of a small animal in harmony with its surroundings? Stick-Insect-On-A-Rock-O. Too late!!!!!
